text: Yesli by Allakh uvelichil udel vsem Svoim rabam, kak oni zhelayut, oni rasprostranili by nechestiye na zemle i tvorili by bezzakoniya, no Allakh po Svoyey mudrosti uvelichivayet udel tomu, komu pozhelayet, i ogranichivayet tomu, komu pozhelayet. Poistine, Allakh ob"yemlet Svoim znaniyem vso, chto skryvayut i obnaruzhivayut yego raby, i On po Svoyey mudrosti predopredelyayet kazhdomu to, chto ispravlyayet yego dela i luchshe dlya nego
